text: (isase pahale bhee rasoolon ke saath yahee hua.) yahaan tak ki jab rasool niraash ho gaye aur logon ko vishvaas ho gaya ki unase jhooth bola gaya hai, to unake lie hamaaree sahaayata aa gaee, phir ham jise chaahate hain, bacha lete hain aur hamaaree yaatana aparaadhiyon se pheree nahin jaatee
